summary: hoppei - The Memetic Revolution - Hoppei, the Chinese version of $HOPPY, is on a mission to take over the meme universe. The token has a total supply of 420,690,000,000 and features no taxes forever, LP tokens burned, and contract ownership renounced. The project aims to reach 100,000 holders in Phase 2 and ultimately takeover the meme universe in Phase 3. Instructions on how to buy hoppei tokens on Uniswap are provided in the passage.
